Sim: ${_$.yes} X NÃ£o: ${_$.no}` }} catch(e) {console.log(e);}}

commands.name: !sorteio
commands.message: if(['entrar','participar'].some((el) => el === args[0]) && !_$.users.includes(context.username)) { _$.users = [..._$.users, context.username]; } else if(['tirar'].some((el) => el === args[0]) && ['mod','admin'].some((el) => el === context['user-type'])) { let userIndex = _$.users.indexOf(args[1]); _$.users.splice(userIndex, 1) } else if(args[0] === 'iniciar' && ['admin', 'mod'].some((el) => context['user-type'] === el)) { let result = _$.users[Math.floor(Math.random()*_$.users.length)];_$.users = [];setTimeout(() => client.say(target, '2..'), 1000);setTimeout(() => client.say(target, '3...'), 2000); setTimeout(() => client.say(target, `O resultado do sorteio foi @${result}!`), 3000); return '1...'; } else if('contar' === args[0] && ['mod', 'admin'].some((el) => el === context['user-type'])) { return `${_$.users.length} no sorteio.` }
